column5: Anyone know of a place to buy one of the hard flip and fold covers at a reasonable price. Finnally gonna be able to lock stuff in the box.
Im sure Van & Truck world has em...
got mine at cobra in mississauga
[ what kinda pricing am i looking at on these   quote name=tambo' date='Aug 30 2009, 10:26 PM' post='378325] got mine at cobra in mississauga
Custom Covers by Robert in Brampton has always done good work for me!

I have one for sale in the classified section...actually my dad is selling it but I am helping advertize.  It is on a 2009 Chevy Silverado - 8 foot box.  And it is only 3 weeks old.  He decided to go with the truck cap now and is selling the cover for much less than he paid.  Asking $450 when he just paid $630+ for it.  Call me if interested....905-893-4186
Got mine at Auto Parts Source.  They had a catalog you could go through and pick what ya need or want.
